compounddef.title: XMODEM code used by the firmware update process

briefdescription.para: receiver requests XMODEM (with checksum), or did not receive last block

sectiondef.header: Values for \c flags member of xbee_xmodem_state_t

briefdescription.para: macro for "no flags", used when calling xbee_xmodem_tx_init
force use of XMODEM-CRC (by ignoring NAK at start of transfer)
64-byte blocks non-standard block size used for OTA updates
mask of user-settable flags that can be passed to xbee_xmodem_tx_init
waiting for NAK or CRC char
waiting for ACK of current packet
reached end of file, close connection
waiting for final ACK from receiver
Values for state member of xbee_xmodem_state_t.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* xbee_xmodem_read_fn) (void FAR *context, void FAR *buffer, int16_t bytes)
memberdef.name: xbee_xmodem_read_fn

briefdescription.para: Function to assign to file.read or stream.read member of an xbee_xmodem_state_t object.

detaileddescription.para: Used to read data from the Xmodem receiver (ACK/NAK bytes) or the firmware source (e.g., file or embedded array).

parameterdescription.para: either file.context or stream.context from the xbee_xmodem_state_t object
maximum number of bytes to write to buffer
NULL pointer or negative byte count passed to function

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* xbee_xmodem_write_fn) (void FAR *context, const void FAR *buffer, int16_t bytes)
memberdef.argsstring: )(void FAR *context, const void FAR *buffer, int16_t bytes)
memberdef.name: xbee_xmodem_write_fn

briefdescription.para: Function to assign to stream.write member of an xbee_xmodem_state_t object.

detaileddescription.para: Used to write data to the Xmodem receiver (blocks of data).

parameterdescription.para: bytes to send to the receiver
NULL pointer or negative byte count passed to function

briefdescription.para: Table for XMODEM and "False CCITT" CRC, calculated with standard 0x1021 polynomial.
flags for tracking state of transfer
current packet number; starts at 1 and low byte used in block headers
timer value used to hold low word of xbee_millisecond_timer()

para.heading: of tries left before giving up

briefdescription.para: function and context to read source of sent data
functions and context to communicate with target device

memberdef.argsstring: (const void FAR *data, uint16_t length, uint16_t current)
memberdef.name: crc16_calc

briefdescription.para: Calculate CRC-16 of a data buffer using polynomial (0x1021) without reflection.

parameterdescription.para: When calculating a CRC-16 over a stream or a large range of bytes, it is necessary to call crc16_calc multiple times.

listitem.para: Use an initial value of 0x0000 to generate an "XMODEM" CRC.
Use an initial value of 0xFFFF to generate a "FALSE CCITT" CRC.

simplesect.para: CRC-16, without reflection, for length bytes of data, using current as the starting CRC and 0x1021 as a polynomial.

memberdef.argsstring: (void FAR *context, const void FAR *buffer, int16_t bytes)
memberdef.name: _xbee_xmodem_ser_write

briefdescription.para: Used for xmodem transfers over a simple serial port.

detaileddescription.para: Associates the serial port with the xbee_xmodem_state_t and sets stream.read and stream.write function pointers to helper functions that read/write a serial port.
Must be called before xbee_xmodem_tx_tick() and either before or after xbee_xmodem_tx_init().

parameterdescription.para: state object to configure for serial read/write

memberdef.argsstring: (xbee_xmodem_state_t *xbxm, xbee_xmodem_read_fn read, xbee_xmodem_write_fn write, const void FAR *context)
memberdef.name: xbee_xmodem_set_stream

briefdescription.para: Configure the stream used to communicate with the target.

detaileddescription.para: Associates function pointers and a context that are used to send data to and receive data from the target (device receiving data via Xmodem).

parameterdescription.para: function used to read bytes from the target
function used to send bytes to the target
context passed to read and write functions
successfully configured communication path to target

memberdef.argsstring: (xbee_xmodem_state_t *xbxm, void FAR *buffer, xbee_xmodem_read_fn read, const void FAR *context)
memberdef.name: xbee_xmodem_set_source

briefdescription.para: Configure the data source for the Xmodem send.

parameterdescription.para: buffer for use by xbee_xmodem_tx_tick must be at least 5 bytes larger than the block size passed to xbee_xmodem_tx_init()
function used to read bytes to send to the target

internal.para: Helper function to read a single character from the stream.
Helper function to write a single character to the stream.

briefdescription.para: Initialize state structure for use with xbee_xmodem_tx_tick() to send a file via Xmodem.

parameterdescription.para:
one of the following macros, indicating the block size to use for the transfer
XBEE_XMODEM_FLAG_NONE
XBEE_XMODEM_FLAG_64
XBEE_XMODEM_FLAG_128
XBEE_XMODEM_FLAG_1024
initialized state, can pass it to xbee_xmodem_tx_tick

briefdescription.para: Function to drive the Xmodem send state machine.

detaileddescription.para: Call until it returns a non-zero result.

parameterdescription.para: connection timed out waiting for data from target
transfer in progress, call function again
